role.name: UI: Search
role.description: Gives access to the Search screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Repository Browser
role.description: Gives access to the Repository Browser screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: System Feeds
role.description: Gives access to the System Feeds screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Logs and Config Files
role.description: Gives access to the Logs and Config Files screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Server Administration
role.description: Gives access to the Server Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Repository Administration
role.description: Gives access to the Repository Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Group Administration
role.description: Gives access to the Group Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Routing Administration
role.description: Gives access to the Routing Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Scheduled Task Administration
role.description: Gives access to the Scheduled Task Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Repository Target Administration
role.description: Gives access to the Repository Target Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: User Administration
role.description: Gives access to the User Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Role Administration
role.description: Gives access to the Role Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Privilege Administration
role.description: Gives access to the Privilege Administration screen in Nexus UI

role.name: UI: Base UI Privileges
role.description: Generic privileges for users in the Nexus UI

repositoryTargetPrivilege.name: All M2 Repositories - (read)
repositoryTargetPrivilege.description: Give permission to read any content in any Maven 2 type repositories.

repositoryTargetPrivilege.name: All M1 Repositories - (read)
repositoryTargetPrivilege.description: Give permission to read any content in any Maven 1 type repositories.

repositoryTargetPrivilege.name: All M2 Repositories - (update)
repositoryTargetPrivilege.description: Give permission to update any content in any Maven 2 type repositories.

repositoryTargetPrivilege.name: All M1 Repositories - (update)
repositoryTargetPrivilege.description: Give permission to update any content in any Maven 1 type repositories.

repositoryTargetPrivilege.name: All M2 Repositories - (create)
repositoryTargetPrivilege.description: Give permission to create any content in any Maven 2 type repositories.

repositoryTargetPrivilege.name: All M1 Repositories - (create)
repositoryTargetPrivilege.description: Give permission to create any content in any Maven 1 type repositories.

repositoryTargetPrivilege.name: All M2 Repositories - (delete)
repositoryTargetPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete any content in any Maven 2 type repositories.

repositoryTargetPrivilege.name: All M1 Repositories - (delete)
repositoryTargetPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete any content in any Maven 1 type repositories.

applicationPrivilege.name: Administrator privilege (ALL)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to everything available in nexus.

applicationPrivilege.name: Status - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to query the nexus server for it's status. This privilege is required by the anonymous user so that the UI can retrieve anonymous permissions on startup.

applicationPrivilege.name: Login to UI
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to allow a user to login to nexus.

applicationPrivilege.name: Server Settings - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read the nexus server settings.

applicationPrivilege.name: Server Settings - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read the nexus server settings.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repositories - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read new repositories.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repositories - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing repository configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repositories - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing repository configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repositories - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing repositories.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Templates - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read new repository templates. Note that this privilege is not currently invoked by the Nexus UI.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Templates - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing repository template configuration. This privilege is required to add a new Repository in the UI, as the default values are retrieved from the template on the server.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Templates - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing repository template configuration. Note that this privilege is not currently invoked by the Nexus UI.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Templates - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing repository templates. Note that this privilege is not currently invoked by the Nexus UI.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Groups - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read new repository groups.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Groups - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing repository group configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Groups - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing repository group configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Groups - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing repository groups.

applicationPrivilege.name: Search Repositories
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to perform searches of repository content.

applicationPrivilege.name: Reindex
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to Reindex repository content. The extents of this privilege are related to the allowed targets.

applicationPrivilege.name: Checksum Search
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to perform checksum type searches of repository content. The extents of this privilege are related to the allowed targets.

applicationPrivilege.name: Rebuild Repository Attributes
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to rebuild the attributes of repository content. The extents of this privilege are related to the allowed targets.

applicationPrivilege.name: Clear Repository Cache
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to clear the content of a repositories not found cache. The extents of this privilege are related to the allowed targets.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Routes - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read repository routes.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Routes - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing repository route configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Routes - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing repository route configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Routes - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing repository routes.

applicationPrivilege.name: Scheduled Tasks - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read scheduled tasks.

applicationPrivilege.name: Scheduled Tasks - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing scheduled task configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Scheduled Tasks - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing scheduled task configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Scheduled Tasks - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing scheduled tasks.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Privileges - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read privileges.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Privileges - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing privilege configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Privileges - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing privilege configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Privileges - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing privileges.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Roles - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read user roles.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Roles - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing user role configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Roles - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing user role configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Roles - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing user roles.

applicationPrivilege.name: Users - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read users.

applicationPrivilege.name: Users - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing user configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Users - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing user configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Users - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing users.

applicationPrivilege.name: Logs - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to retrieve the nexus log files.

applicationPrivilege.name: Configuration File - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to retrieve the nexus.xml configuration file.

applicationPrivilege.name: RSS Feeds - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to view the different RSS feeds. The extents of this privilege are related to the allowed targets.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Targets - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to create,read repository targets.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Targets - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read existing repository target configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Targets - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read existing repository target configuration.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Targets - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read existing repository targets.

applicationPrivilege.name: Server Status - (update,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to update,read the status of the nexus server. Note that this privilege is not currently invoked by the Nexus UI.

applicationPrivilege.name: Wastebasket - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read the contents of the nexus trash. Note that this privilege is not currently invoked by the Nexus UI.

applicationPrivilege.name: Wastebasket - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to delete,read the contents of the nexus trash.

applicationPrivilege.name: Artifact Download
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to download artifacts (using /artifact service, not the /content url). The extents of this privilege are related to the allowed targets.. Note that this privilege is not currently invoked by the Nexus UI.

applicationPrivilege.name: Read Repository Status
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to retrieve the status of a repository.

applicationPrivilege.name: Repository Content Classes - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to retrieve the list of repository content classes supported by nexus.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Forgot Password - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to request that a password be generated an emailed to a certain user.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Forgot User Id - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to request that a username be emailed to a certain email address.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Reset Password - (delete,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to reset any user's password.

applicationPrivilege.name: User Change Password - (create,read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to change a user's password.

applicationPrivilege.name: Artifact Upload
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to upload artifacts (using /artifact service, not the /content service). The extents of this privilege are related to the allowed targets.

applicationPrivilege.name: Nexus Remote Control
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to remotely control nexus server (start, stop, etc.). Note that this privilege is not currently invoked by the Nexus UI.

applicationPrivilege.name: Read Repository Metadata
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to read the repository metadata. Note that this privilege is not currently invoked by the Nexus UI.

applicationPrivilege.name: Scheduled Tasks - (run)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to run existing scheduled tasks manually.

applicationPrivilege.name: Scheduled Task Types - (read)
applicationPrivilege.description: Give permission to retrieve list of support task types available in nexus.
